explains: v. 吃草；放牧；擦过；擦伤，擦破；<非正式>经常吃零食而不吃正餐，吃很多零食；<美，非正式>随意地尝试（或体验、浏览）
wordGroup: graze on 吃（牛羊等吃草）

sentences.en: The land is used by local people to graze their animals.
sentences.cn: 这块地当地人用来放牧。

sentences.en: There is good grassland here for your cattle and horses to graze on.
sentences.cn: 这里有很好的草地供你们放牧牛马。

sentences.en: I anoint the head and nose of each sheep with the same oil, and allow them to graze.
sentences.cn: 我用同样的油抹在每只羊的头上和鼻子上，并让它们吃草。
